settings.description:
Welcome to MILLY. It’s a mood — color combinations, mixed prints and an air of sophistication. 

MILLY fuses Parisian influence with a vibrant New York energy. From statement colors to optimistic silhouettes, stepping into MILLY is an occasion all on its own.

settings.title: HOW CAN I CONTACT CUSTOMER CARE?
settings.answer: Please email customercare@milly.com. Please note all inquiries will be answered within 48 hours.

settings.title: WHAT IS THE MILLY RETURN AND EXCHANGE POLICY?
settings.answer:
We hope you love what you ordered and that your purchase results in a true #millymoment. We are happy to accept eligible returns in new and unused condition within 30 days from receipt of the package. No returns are able to be accepted past 30 days. A refund, less a $14.00 restocking fee per order, will be made in the original form of payment if selected. If store credit is selected, the restocking fee will be waived. Items must not be worn, damaged or altered in any way and all tags must be attached. For the return of swimwear, the sanitary lining must be attached.

Please note: all items marked final sale (ending in .99) cannot be returned or exchanged.

MILLY reserves the right to deny any return that does not fall within the specific guidelines listed above. Items will be sent back directly to the customer in a timely manner should they not fit MILLY’s return requirements.

Not the perfect fit? MILLY is happy to offer an exchange of your eligible item for a different size or color with a waived restocking fee. Please note all exchanges must follow the same return guidelines as listed above and are subject to the item's availability.

settings.title: HOW DO I DETERMINE MY SIZE?
settings.answer: See the MILLY size chart for women and the MILLY size chart for MILLY Minis childrenswear. If you have questions about sizing, please email customercare@milly.com.

settings.title: WHAT IF MY SIZE IS NOT AVAILABLE?
settings.answer: Please click the link “can’t find my size” on the product page of the desired product, enter your email and select your desired size, and we will email you when if it becomes available again!

settings.title: I AM LOOKING FOR A MILLY ITEM THAT IS NOT CURRENTLY FOUND ON THE MILLY.COM WEBSITE. WHAT DO I DO?
settings.answer: Please email customercare@milly.com and include a photo of the item, style number if available, and your desired size and color.

settings.title: HOW DO I MAKE A RETURN OR EXCHANGE?
settings.answer: Click here for easy returns!

settings.title: TROUBLE WITH YOUR RETURN?
settings.answer: If you are having trouble creating your return shipping label, please email customercare@milly.com.

settings.title: WHAT IS AFTERPAY?
settings.answer: MILLY is pleased to offer AfterPay, a payment method where you can shop now and pay later through interest-free monthly installments. For more information on AfterPay, please visit https://www.afterpay.com/index .

settings.title: QUESTIONS REGARDING YOUR PURCHASE THAT YOU PAID FOR WITH AFTERPAY?
settings.answer: For all product and order related questions, please contact MILLY Customer Care at customercare@milly.com. For payment related questions, please contact AfterPay directly at 855-289-6014 or visit their help center here. Please note the MILLY Customer Care representatives cannot assist you with AfterPay related payments, or payment questions.

settings.title: WHAT ARE MY SHIPPING OPTIONS?
settings.answer: Click Here to Review Shipping Information!

settings.title: DOES MILLY CHARGE SALES TAX?
settings.answer: Milly.com currently only charges sales tax for items being delivered to New York State and Massachusetts.

settings.title: HOW DO I CARE FOR MY MILLY CLOTHING?
settings.answer: Many of our items have special hand detailing and embellishments which may require special care. While most of our care details are listed on the product pages, if you have a specific question regarding how to treat and clean your MILLY clothing, please email customercare@milly.com.

settings.title: CAN I CANCEL MY ORDER ON MILLY.COM?
settings.answer: Once your order is submitted, we unfortunately cannot guarantee any cancellation. Please reach out to customercare@milly.com with your order number immediately and we will try our best to honor the cancellation.

settings.title: Price Adjustments
settings.answer: We offer price adjustments within 30 days of your order being placed for styles that are currently carried on our site. All price adjusted items are considered final sale and are not eligible for returns. Additionally, all items labeled as Final Sale are not eligible for price adjustments.

settings.title: Notice: Shipping Delays Expected - Read More
settings.answer: Shipping Notice: Our shipping carriers are currently experiencing shipping delays due to volume and carrier availability. We apologize for any trouble this has caused.

settings.title: WHAT IS THE MILLY RETURN AND EXCHANGE POLICY?
settings.answer:
We hope you love what you ordered and that your purchase results in a true #millymoment. We are happy to accept eligible returns in new and unused condition within 30 days from receipt of the package. A refund, less a $14.00 restocking fee per order, will be made in the original form of payment if selected. If store credit is selected, the restocking fee will be waived. Items must not be worn, damaged or altered in any way and all tags must be attached.

Please note: all items marked final sale (ending in .99) cannot be returned or exchanged. We currently don't offer exchanges or refunds on an item that was previously exchanged.

MILLY reserves the right to deny any return that does not fall within the specific guidelines listed above. Items will be sent back directly to the customer in a timely manner should they not fit MILLY’s return requirements.

Not the perfect fit? MILLY is happy to offer an exchange of your eligible item for a different size or color with a waived restocking fee. Please note all exchanges must follow the same return guidelines as listed above and are subject to the item's availability.

settings.title: HOW DO I MAKE A RETURN OR EXCHANGE?
settings.answer: Click here to start our easy return and exchange process!

settings.title: Price Adjustments
settings.answer: We offer price adjustments within 30 days of your order being placed for styles that are currently carried on our site. All price adjusted items are considered final sale and are not eligible for returns. Additionally, all items labeled as Final Sale are not eligible for price adjustments.

settings.title: Holiday Returns Policy
settings.answer: We are excited to let you know that we have extended our returns window for the holidays. We will accept eligible returns within 45 days from receipt of purchase for order placed between November 15th – December 15th.

settings.title: INTERNATIONAL ORDERS
settings.answer:
MILLY has partnered with a trusted third-party partner to ship globally and accurately show you the duties and taxes needed to fulfill international orders. Simply put, the items you wish to purchase in your Shopping Cart and choose your destination, the cost for shipping your order depends on your location, the size of your order, and the service level you choose for shipping (Express, Standard). In addition, we will process your payment along with all taxes and duties. Once we process and scan your order you will receive tracking information if you included your email address. Please note that due to specific carriers schedules it may take two or three business days to ship out from our facility. Please direct all inquiries customercare@milly.com

Thank you.

settings.title: INTERNATIONAL RETURN POLICY
settings.answer: At this time we are unable to accept returns on all International orders. If you have questions regarding size and fit please email or call us prior to purchasing, and our style consultant can help you determine the proper size to purchase.
